title-group.article-title: New Integer Representations as the Sum of Three Cubes

abstract.p: We describe a new algorithm for finding integer solutions to x³+ y³ + z³ = k for specific values of k. We use this to find representations for values of k for which no solution was previously known, including k = 30 and k = 52.
